Translations.Text: Apani ki laksya karena na taderake yara allahara nidarsana samparke bitarka kare? Taderake kothaya phirano hacche
yara mithyaropa kare kitabe ebam yasaha amadera rasulaganake amara pathiyechi tate; ata'eba, tara sighra'i janate parabe
yakhana tadera galaya beri o srnkhala thakabe, taderake tene niye ya'oya habe
Phutanta panite, tarapara taderake porano habe agune
Pare taderake bala habe, 'kothaya tara yaderake tomara sarika karate
allaha chara?' Tara balabe, â€˜tara to amadera kacha theke udha'o hayeche [1]; baram age amara kichuke dakini.â€™ Ebhabe allaha kaphiraderake bibhraanta karena
Eta e jan'ye ye, tomara yamine ayatha ullasa karate [1] ebam ejan'ye ye, tomara ahankara karate
Tomara jahannamera bibhinna daraja diye prabesa kara, tate sthayibhabe abasthanera jan'ya, ata'eba kata'i na nikrsta ahankaridera abasasthala

sutaram apani dhairya dharana karuna. Niscaya allahara pratisruti satya. Atahpara amara taderake ye pratisruti pradana kari tara kichu yadi apanake dekhiye de'i athaba apanara mrtyu ghata'i---tabe tadera phire asa to amadera'i kache

Ara abasya'i amara apanara purbe aneka rasula pathiyechi. Amara tadera karo karo kahini apanara kache bibrta karechi ebam karo karo kahini apanara kache bibrta karini. Ara allahara anumati chara kono nidarsana niye asa kono rasulera kaja naya. Atahpara yakhana allahara adesa asabe takhana n'yayasangatabhabe phayasala haye yabe. Ara takhana batilapanthira ksatigrasta habe
